hotel name: Hotel Saint Sauveur by WP Hotels
pos review: Excellent breakfast Very professional staff, ready to help to get your preferred room if you already went at this hotel.

hotel name: Hotel Saint Sauveur by WP Hotels
pos review: Bath a bit high to get out of, otherwise good comfortable room
neg review: Would have like more coffee and some tea available in the room

hotel name: Hotel Saint Sauveur by WP Hotels
pos review: good location, spacious room, good beds, good breakfast, friendly personnel
neg review: I had trouble sleeping because of noises on the street

hotel name: Hotel Saint Sauveur by WP Hotels
pos review: Excellent service, friendly receptionist, exceptionally good variety breakfast, close to everything in city centre, i.e. shopping, beach, restaurants, pleasant pool

hotel name: Hotel Saint Sauveur by WP Hotels
neg review: It wasn't clean, there was mold, rust and generally in need of repairs & deep-cleaning.
